00033 #define REGISTER_OBJECT(factory, object, key) \
00034     namespace { \
00035         ObjectFactoryRegister<object> \
00036             _register_##object(factory, key); \
00037     }
00038 
00049 template<typename key_t, typename T>
00050 class ObjectFactory
00051 {
00052 private:
00053     typedef T* (*creator_t)();
00054 public:
00055 
00056     typedef T abstract_type;
00057     typedef map<key_t, creator_t> assoc_map;
00058     
00059     ObjectFactory() {}
00060     ~ObjectFactory() {};
00061     
00070     void Register(const key_t &key, creator_t creator );
00071 
00072     template< typename obj_t >
00073     void Register(const key_t &key);
00074 
00078     T *Create(const key_t &key);
00079     bool IsRegistered(const key_t & _id) const;
00080 
00081     static ObjectFactory<key_t, T>& Instance()
00082     {
00083         static ObjectFactory<key_t, T> _this;
00084         return _this;
00085     }
00086 
00087     const assoc_map &getObjects() { return _objects; }
00088 private:
00089     assoc_map _objects;
00090 };
00091 
00092 template<class parent, class T> parent* create_policy_new()
00093 {
00094     return new T();
00095 }
00096 
00097 template<typename key_t, typename T>
00098 inline void ObjectFactory<key_t, T>::Register(const key_t &key, creator_t creator)
00099 {
00100     _objects.insert(typename assoc_map::value_type(key, creator)).second;
00101 }
00102 
00103 template<typename key_t, typename T>
00104 template< typename obj_t >
00105 inline void ObjectFactory<key_t, T>::Register(const key_t &key)
00106 {
00107     Register(key, create_policy_new<abstract_type, obj_t>);
00108 }
00109 
00110 
00111 template<typename key_t, typename T>
00112 inline T* ObjectFactory<key_t, T>::Create(const key_t &key)
00113 {
00114     typename assoc_map::const_iterator it(_objects.find(key));
00115     if (it != _objects.end())
00116         return (it->second)();
00117     else
00118         throw std::runtime_error("factory key " + key + " not found.");
00119 }

00123 {
00124     static ObjectFactory<key_t, T> _this;
00125     return _this;
00126 }*/
00127 
00128 template<typename key_t, typename T>
00129 inline bool ObjectFactory<key_t, T>::IsRegistered(const key_t & _id) const
00130 {
00131         return ( _objects.find(_id)!= _objects.end() );
00132 }

00142 
00143 template<typename object_type >
00144 class ObjectFactoryRegister {
00145 public:
00146     template<typename factory_type, typename key_type>
00147     ObjectFactoryRegister(factory_type &factory, key_type &key) {
00148         factory.Register(key, &create_policy_new<typename factory_type::abstract_type, object_type>);
00149     }
00150 };
